1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Message list.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Core.Lexmap.Message
6  ( -- * Abortable
7    abLexmap,
8    -- * Message
9    ambRelmap,
10    reqGroup,
11    unkRelmap,
12  ) where
13
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base          as B
15
16-- | Abortable scope for lexmap.
17abLexmap :: (B.GetCodePos cp) => B.Abortable cp b
18abLexmap = B.abortable "lexmap"
19
20-- | Ambiguous relmaps
21ambRelmap :: String -> [d] -> B.Ab a
22ambRelmap name ds = B.leftLine "Ambiguous relmaps"
23                         $ name ++ " (" ++ show (length ds) ++ ")"
24
25-- | Require grouping paren
26reqGroup :: B.Ab a
27reqGroup = B.leftBecause "Require grouping parens"
28
29-- | Unknown relmap operator
30unkRelmap :: String -> B.Ab a
31unkRelmap = B.leftLine "Unknown relmap operator"
32
